#### Notes:

Gender hints: Many fruit nouns are feminine (la pomme, la banane, la fraise), but some are masculine (le citron, l'ananas). Plurals use "les".

Partitives: Use du/de la for "some" (du raisin, de la pastÃ¨que).

Plural alert: Les raisins (grapes), les cerises (cherries), les bananes (bananas) are plural.

<script>

function checkAnswer(input, correctAnswer) {
  const span = input.nextElementSibling;
  if (input.value.trim().toLowerCase() === correctAnswer.toLowerCase()) {
    span.textContent = "âœ“ Correct";
    span.style.color = "green";
  } else {
    span.textContent = "";
  }
}

function showAnswers() {
  document.querySelectorAll('input[type="text"]').forEach(el => {
    const correct = el.getAttribute('oninput')?.match(/'([^']+)'/)?.[1];
    if (correct) {
      const span = el.nextElementSibling;
      span.textContent = `RÃ©ponse : ${correct}`;
      span.style.color = "blue";
    }
  });
}

function refreshPage() {
  location.reload();
}
</script>
